welcome: Welcome to the Multi-language Conversion Tool!
configPrompt: Please answer the following questions to configure the conversion process...
groupKeyPrompt: Group key to process (only traverse the specified group key, leave empty to process root level):
langCodesPrompt: Enter language codes list (comma separated, order should match language columns in CSV file):
outputDirNotExist: Output directory "{dir}" does not exist, creating...
groupKeyNotExist: Group key "{key}" does not exist in template JSON file
processingRoot: Processing translation items directly (JSON not grouped)
notCsvFormat: File "{path}" is not in CSV format
csvRowCount: CSV file contains {count} rows of translation data
readJsonWarning: Warning: Cannot read {lang}.json file, will create new file: {message}
noUpdateNeeded: - {lang}.json file needs no update, all {unchanged} translations unchanged
groupOption: Group key to process (only traverse the specified group key, leave empty to process root level)
langCodesOption: Language codes list, order should match language columns in CSV file, generate corresponding json files based on language codes
example1: Process multi-language file with default configuration
example2: Process multi-language file with specified group key
